description: This Java class defines the WebhookSubscription entity, which models outbound webhook subscriptions for partner events in the system. It includes fields for subscription details such as partner, event type, target URL, secret token, activity status, and timestamps for creation and updates.

classes.name: WebhookSubscription
classes.description: Entity class representing webhook subscriptions for external partner integrations, with persistence annotations and getter/setter methods.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the webhook subscription.

methods.name: setPartner
methods.description: Sets the partner entity associated with this webhook subscription.

methods.name: getEventType
methods.description: Returns the type of event for which this webhook is subscribed.

methods.name: setEventType
methods.description: Sets the event type for this webhook subscription.

methods.name: getTargetUrl
methods.description: Returns the target URL where webhook notifications are sent.

methods.name: setTargetUrl
methods.description: Sets the target URL for webhook notifications.

methods.name: getSecretToken
methods.description: Returns the secret token used for verifying webhook requests.

methods.name: setSecretToken
methods.description: Sets the secret token used for webhook request verification.

methods.name: getActive
methods.description: Checks whether the webhook subscription is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Enables or disables the webhook subscription.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the subscription was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of the last update to the subscription.
